blogs.title: Understanding JSON
blogs.content: JSON stands for JavaScript Object Notation. It is a lightweight data interchange format that is easy for humans to read and write, and easy for machines to parse and generate.
blogs.author: John Doe

blogs.title: Getting Started with Python

blogs.author: Jane Smith

blogs.title: Exploring JavaScript
blogs.content: JavaScript is a dynamic programming language that is widely used for web development. It allows developers to create interactive and dynamic web pages.
blogs.author: Alice Johnson
